docs.snippet: The O’Bannon case says that the N.C.A.A. violated the law by price-fixing. In another case, two universities argued that the N.C.A.A. restrained trade by controlling television contracts....

docs.snippet: Skills honed on behalf of President Bashar al-Assad will be used for militia groups battling the Sunnis who are driving toward Baghdad....
docs.lead_paragraph: Skills honed on behalf of President Bashar al-Assad will be used for militia groups battling the Sunnis who are driving toward Baghdad.
docs.abstract: Shiites respond by the thousands to call to arms issued by Grand Ayatollah Ali al-Sistani to protect fellow Shiites and to prop up Shiite government of Iraqi Prime Min Nuri Kamal al-Maliki; strong response is in part due to fact that Shiites feel that they are on verge of squandering opportunity to rule in Iraq; reliance on Shiite militias to combat Islamic State in Iraq and Syria fighters raises chilling memories of sectarian war that raged there from 2005 to 2008.

headline.main: Seeing Their Gains at Risk, Shiites Flock to Join Militias
